string.text: Stalker! Quick! My friend needs help urgently, he's there - in the mine! What are you waiting for? He won't last long, but I will manage somehow. Hurry up!
Okay, don't worry, I'll find him.
Lookie here, and who's that? What are you doing here?
Nothing, just looking around. Can I go now?
Bullshit! I know you came after the data we got to get - there's no other reason for you to be here. Now give me everything you've taken - and we'll let you go.
What are you talking about? I don't know anything about your data.
Alright, I don't want no trouble; take it. That's all I found.
Alright, now stand still here and don't move! When my guys let you, you can go. Got it?
Yes, I got it.
Hey man!
Why the hell are you sitting in this radioactive shit? Quick, let's get out of here! A friend of yours sent me to find you.
Oh, no wonder why I don't feel so good... Now let's get out of here: I know a safe place nearby. You can go, and I need a moment to stretch my legs; they hurt...
Let's go, we'll talk later.
So, why have we stopped?
Well, I don't have a gun, and there's a bunch of these fleshes... Kill them - and then we'll move on.
Alright, just a moment. You wait here.
What now?

We have arrived: I've got a stash with some gear here. Now let me tell you what happened to me. I'd got a job along with another guy: we had to sweep some zombies in the village. When we had got close to the place, the buddy pointed his gun at my back; forced me to give him all of my stuff - even the jacket... bastard! And then he ran away. I can't stand zombies, so I'd got into that house and was hiding there all that time.
The Zone is not a walk in the park: there's danger around every corner, and humans can be the most dangerous.

You think I don't know that? But there are some people... you can't realize they're rats until they've set you up. Alright, we don't have time for this now. I'll get to my stash and take some equipment from there - but you stay here, don't you take a sneak peek at my stuff. And if you try to, I won't get into the stash; I'll wait until you are gone.
Alright, I'm waiting here, just be quick.
Alright, take your gear and let's go already.
You do realize that I won't get to my stash while you're here? Walk away please and wait outside, alrighty?
Alright, got it, I'm going out.
See you soon.
So, changed to fancier clothing? Where are we headed now?
Well, geared up? Where do we go now?
Yeah, that's much better. Let's go to the Duty's outpost, these guys are solid - it's safe there.
Let's go.
So, what can you tell me?

I'm staying here: I can't move further - have to rest. And then I'll go to the Bar. Thanks a lot, man! Take this as a reward, I don't have anything else. I've had it in my stash for a rainy day. It's pretty rare, take care of it. I'll try and contact my friend myself, but if you see him, tell him I'm alright. I'll contact you later, after I get some info on the guy who set me up.
Alright then, bye.
Well, geared up? Where do we go?
So, what can you tell me?
I'm staying here: I can't move further - have to rest.
I see. Well, bye.
